Player History

Hit first career homerun on 5/23/1986, off Bob Patterson (SD)...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,517,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,517,143 through salary arbitration...

2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,517,143 through salary arbitration...
